textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (“Pitch black darkness”)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The only thing echoing in your mind, as all your senses seem to have lost function)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Did the device take you to a wrong room?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (A sense of impending doom rushes through you,      until you notice a faint beeping from behind..)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You turn around,         noticing a single device,            lighting up its surroundings,               faintly buzzing and beeping)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The both of you seem to be standing on a limited flat surface,              followed by the dark abyss next to it)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You could have sworn it wasn’t there a second ago)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You take a step closer to the device)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Its presence seems entirely out of place, compared to the completely hollow room around you)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The screen seems to display various symbols)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (What is this device?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You move back a bit, trying to focus on the noises that caught your attention in the first place)
{italic}*Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*      *Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*      *Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*     *Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*{/italic}

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (It seems to be repeating the same thing over and over again…)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Why is it beeping?         Does it have a purpouse?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Is someone meant to hear this?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (Who,       is meant to hear this?)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (As you contemplate all those questions,            the hollow room starts to seem more narrow)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You hallucinate the beeping,        echoing from non-existing walls,           slowly closing in as you stare at the device)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (For a split second...)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (...It felt like the device was crying)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (You move back once more)

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (The rooms seems to return to normal,        leaving only the faint buzzing and beeping of the device in front of you)
{italic}*Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*      *Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*      *Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*     *Beeep Beep Beep Beep...*{/italic}

textBox.name: {you}
textBox.text: (A faint wave of sorrow washes over you as you listen to the device some more...)
